content.rendered:
Policy Issues.

In our bid to ensure community-driven development, inclusive governance and open democracy in the FCT, we have set up 2RUHOPE Hubs across all 6 Municipal Zones.

Look up the locations and contact information for all our Community Engagement Hubs and find one closest to you. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us here.

BLUE ECONOMY DEVELOPMENT.

INDIGENOUS COMMUNITIES’ ENGAGEMENT AND EMPOWERMENT.
